name: Rebirth of the Fallen
description:
You must use the crosses to resurrect all of your fallen friends!

Use the directional arrows to move around and the space bar to drop traps you pick up!

The traps you obtain must be placed on an empty spot above you. ⇧ You can permanently kill multiple enemies with one trap.
You have 5 lives that will carry over with your inventory to the next level! Good Luck!
Press the R key to reset the game at any time!
